quotes: Ricardo Lagos founded the Fundación Democracia y Desarrollo in 2006, a Santiago-based organisation aiming to promote democracy and development.
Between 2006-2008, Ricardo Lagos served as President of the Club de Madrid, a group of global leaders working on governance and conflict issues, and remains a member of the organisation to this day.

quotes: His administration also secured several important free-trade agreements, including with the European Union, the United States and China.
